reviews.headline: Great amazing recommendation!
reviews.comments: To the lady in tik toc who recommended this I owe u thanks and thanks and thanks üôèüèº will be ordering two at a time now ! Affordable as well!

reviews.headline: A New Necessity
reviews.comments: I recently moved to the high desert and can actually feel the moisture being sucked out of my skin. This is an amazing product to take with me and spritz on as I need, it really does help a lot!

reviews.headline: Contains Xylitol! Toxic to dogs - be careful!!!
reviews.comments:
I was excited to try this product. I went online to find out how other people were using it and how they liked it. Noticed that somebody had wrote that this contains xylitol, which is highly toxic to dogs and can easily kill them. I should know, it happened to my dog 8 yrs ago.  Seems like a good product but not sure if ill
Purchase again.

faceoff_positive.comments: I recently tried The INKEY List Hydro-Surge Dewy Face Mist and I'm really happy with how it works but there are a couple of things worth mentioning. First off the mist is incredibly refreshing perfect for a midday pick-me-up or to hydrate after applying makeup. My skin instantly feels more plump and hydrated and it has a nice cooling effect that feels great especially in the warmer months.The mist does give a bit of a dewy finish which I really liked at first but it can be a little too much if I'm having a super oily day. Its great for dry or normal skin but for my combo skin I have to be careful not to overapply. I also love that its packed with good ingredients like glycerin and aloe so I feel like its actually doing something beneficial for my skin. Overall I'm really enjoying it but I'd probably reserve it for when my skin needs a little extra moisture or glow. Definitely a good addition to my skincare routine. Honest review submitted in exchange for product gifted by The INKEY List
faceoff_positive.headline: Refreshing and hydrating but a bit dewy for my li

faceoff_negative.comments: This product has been a go to recently I can feel a difference in the hydration in my face its subtle and light and does great just to add a little life/moisture back into my skin. I'd say that it doesn't have a scent but that could just be me in allergy season not being able to smell lol. the packaging is minimal but I like it. The spray radius is small and its fine if that makes sense- I spray it closer to my face than any other facial mist/spray otherwise it feels like nothing is going on my face. Honest review submitted in exchange for product gifted by The INKEY List
faceoff_negative.headline: Natural looking hydration
